snippet: Polaroid is showing off the SC1630 Smart Camera, a device that tries to blur the lines between a point-and-shoot camera and a smartphone.
abstract: Polaroid is showing off the SC1630 Smart Camera, a device that tries to blur the lines between a point-and-shoot camera and a smartphone.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS -- Every year the camera manufacturers set up huge booths at C.E.S., where they display an impressive array of tiny, powerful cameras. And every year this exercise seems a bit more quaint.
